trends: There have been no other sightings in Troy
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsMy family was on the screened in porch at about 8:10 PM I noticed two bright star like lights in the west,both seemed to be at the same altitude.I got my camera with a 30x zoom and chose the light on the right and snapped photo thru the screen.There were I am sure a great distance away.No sound just hung there.I had never seen these before.
Summary: Saw 2 bright stationary lights in the West,they looked to be at the same altitude and looked like bright stars side by side...Got my camera with 30x zoom,took photo through screen
